SEARCH
Package org.alefajnyprojekt.entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
org.alefajnyprojekt.entities.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Animal, Human
public abstract class Entity extends Object
Abstract class representing an entity in the simulation (e.g., human, animal). Each entity has a position, health status, immunity, movement range, and infection range.

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(Position position, double immunity, int movementRange, int infectionRange, double chanceToInfectOthers)
      Constructor for an abstract Entity.
      Parameters:
      position - Initial position of the entity.
      immunity - Immunity level of the entity (0-1).
      movementRange - Maximum distance the entity can travel in one turn.
      infectionRange - Range at which the entity can spread the disease.
      chanceToInfectOthers - Probability of infecting another entity.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition()

    • getHealthStatus

      public HealthStatus getHealthStatus()

    • getImmunity

      public double getImmunity()

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(Position position)

    • tryToGetInfected

      public boolean tryToGetInfected()
      Tries to infect the entity. Succeeds if a random value is greater than the entity's immunity.
      Returns:
      true if the entity was infected, false otherwise.

    • becomeInfected

      public void becomeInfected()
      Changes the entity's state to INFECTED and sets the turn counter for recovery/death. This method should be overridden in derived classes to set a specific time.

    • determineTurnsForStateChangeAfterInfection

      protected abstract int determineTurnsForStateChangeAfterInfection()
      Abstract method determining the number of turns until state change after infection. Must be implemented by inheriting classes.
      Returns:
      Number of turns.

    • getEntityType

      public abstract String getEntityType()
      Abstract method returning the entity type as a String.
      Returns:
      Entity type.

    • move

      public void move(Board board)
      Logic for the entity's movement on the board. The entity moves in a random direction for a random distance within its movement range.
      Parameters:
      board - The board on which the entity moves.

    • tryToInfectOthers

      public void tryToInfectOthers(List<Entity> allEntities, Board board)
      Logic for spreading the disease. If the entity is infected, it attempts to infect other entities within its infection range.
      Parameters:
      allEntities - List of all entities in the simulation.
      board - The simulation board (for boundary checks, if needed).

    • updateDiseaseState

      public void updateDiseaseState()
      Updates the entity's disease state based on the passage of time (turns). If the entity is infected, it decrements the turnsUntilStateChange counter. After this time, the entity may recover or die.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
